rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment provides a factual report without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
This is a neutral statement about case locations.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports factual events but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser word combined with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment states locations of latest cases, not capabilities or preparedness.
Reports locations of cases, not primarily metrics.
The segment reports current/recent cases, not speculation about future relief.
No direct quote or attributed statement with clear framing language.
Factual report of latest case locations/types without explicit framing cues.
